title: [急】服务端崩溃 不知道怎么解决
author: c972954747
txt_content:
加了几个mod就不行了
crash log如下：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
WARNING: coremods are present:
  FMLPlugin (InventoryTweaks-1.59-176.jar)
  CCLCorePlugin (CodeChickenLib-1.8-1.1.2.133-universal.jar)
  CodeChickenCorePlugin (CodeChickenCore-1.8-1.0.5.36-universal.jar)
  InputFix (InputFix-1.8.x-v2.jar)
  CCCDeobfPlugin (unknown)
  Loader (UniSkinMod-1.8-1.3-dev3.jar)
  NEICorePlugin (NotEnoughItems-1.8-1.0.5.104-universal.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge
// I feel sad now :(
Time: 15-8-25 下午1:27
Description: Exception in server tick loop

replies.author: 風之哀
replies.txt_content:
您好！

请将MouseTweaks-2.5.0-mc1.8.jar从服务端中删除

该mod不需要装入服务端

谢谢！

replies.author: dsssdawd
replies.txt_content: 有些mod不用加进服务器，加了就会变成那样

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content: 把NEI，CodeChickenCore，InventoryTweaks，InputFix，CCCDeob，和UniSkinMod从服务器删删除了，这些安装到客户端就行，不用安装到服务端
